column4: hi all.  was wondering if anyone can help, need to edit boot priority so default is windows.. my kids are screaming at me.. i like this and they like winblows.
you need to edit /boot/grub/menu.lst as the root user/with sudo
alt+f2, type in "gksudo gedit" (without quotes), type in your password, open /boot/grub/menu.lst and change the 'default'
